summary: Replaces some of the \"Ugly\" hairstyles with \"Prettyer\" ones from Female Orcs
descriptionHtml:
This little Modification replaces some of the \"Ugly\" Human hairstyles with \"Prettyer\" ones from Female Orcs. 

Its still work in Progress and will be Updated as soon as Creation kit is been released.

Known Issues:
the crossing between hair and skin is visible. Due to the lack of hairstyles the model would have to be adjusted

Install:
Just add \"Meshes\" to \"Data\" folder.

Enjoy!
author: Wogu
